casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Juan Velez (12822)

Heiman, Speak and Hennessy, Js.

Argued January 9 decision released January 24, 1995 Michael J. Graham, for the appellant (defendant). James M. Ralls, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were James Thomas, state’s attorney, and Thomas Prior, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
